description: Returns the recommendation preferences that are in effect for a given resource, such as enhanced infrastructure metrics. Considers all applicable preferences that you might have set at the resource, account, and organization level. When you create a recommendation preference, you can set its status to Active or Inactive. Use this action to view the recommendation preferences that are in effect, or Active.

parameters.name: resourceArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource for which to confirm effective recommendation preferences. Only EC2 instance and Auto Scaling group ARNs are currently supported.

nested_items.name: enhancedInfrastructureMetrics
nested_items.description: The status of the enhanced infrastructure metrics recommendation preference. Considers all applicable preferences that you might have set at the resource, account, and organization level.

nested_items.name: externalMetricsPreference
nested_items.description: The provider of the external metrics recommendation preference. Considers all applicable preferences that you might have set at the account and organization level.

nested_items.name: source
nested_items.description: Contains the source options for external metrics preferences.

nested_items.name: lookBackPeriod
nested_items.description: The number of days the utilization metrics of the Amazon Web Services resource are analyzed.

nested_items.name: utilizationPreferences
nested_items.description: The resource's CPU and memory utilization preferences, such as threshold and headroom, that were used to generate rightsizing recommendations. It considers all applicable preferences that you set at the resource, account, and organization level.

nested_items.name: metricName
nested_items.description: The name of the resource utilization metric name to customize.

nested_items.name: metricParameters
nested_items.description: The parameters to set when customizing the resource utilization thresholds.

nested_items.name: threshold
nested_items.description: The threshold value used for the specified metric parameter.

nested_items.name: headroom
nested_items.description: The headroom value in percentage used for the specified metric parameter.

nested_items.name: preferredResources
nested_items.description: The resource type values that are considered as candidates when generating rightsizing recommendations. This object resolves any wildcard expressions and returns the effective list of candidate resource type values. It also considers all applicable preferences that you set at the resource, account, and organization level.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the preferred resource list.

nested_items.name: includeList
nested_items.description: The list of preferred resource values that you want considered as rightsizing recommendation candidates.

nested_items.name: effectiveIncludeList
nested_items.description: The expanded version of your preferred resource's include list.

nested_items.name: excludeList
nested_items.description: The list of preferred resources values that you want excluded from rightsizing recommendation candidates.
